topic.title: Choose a web browser
topic.shortdesc: GLPI requires the use of a web browser.

body.p: Optimum operation of the application is achieved by using a modern browser and compliant to web standards. The following browsers are preferred: Firefox version 3 and higher, and Seamonkey version 2 higher, Opera, Safari or Chrome. GLPI also works on Internet Explorer version 7 and above. The Compatibility with Internet Explorer 6 or lower is not assured.
